title: Sidee Ousmane Dembélé u muujiyey inuu istaahilo abaalmarinta Ballon d'Or
text:
Xigashada Sawirka, Getty Images
Xiddiga kooxda Paris St-Germain ee Ousmane Dembele ayaa markii ugu horraysay ku guulaystay abaal marinta Ballon d'Or ka dib markii ay kooxdaas saddexda koob ee France ku guulaysatay ay sidoo kale cayaaryahanno dhowr ah oo ka mid ah ay heleen abaal marino dhawr ah xaflad ka dhacday magaalada Paris.
28-sano jirkaan weerarka ka ciyaara ee reer France ayaa dhaliyay 35 gool, waxaana uu sameeyay 14 caawin 53 kulan oo uu u saftay PSG xilli ciyaareedkii hore isagoo kula guuleystay kooxda horyaalka Champions League, horyaalka faransiiska iyo Koobka French cup.
Waxa uu ahaa gooldhaliyaha ugu sareeya horyaalka Ligue 1, isagoo dhaliyay 21 gool, waxaana loo magacaabay ciyaaryahanka ugu sarreeya horyaalka Faransiiska iyo Champions League.
Waxa uu sidoo kale ka caawiyay PSG finalka koobka kooxaha adduunka oo ay guuldarro ka soo gaartay Chelsea, cayaar ka dhacday New Jersey.
Dembele, oo abaal-marintan uga guulaystay da'yarka Barcelona ee Lamine Yamal, ayaa ka qayb galay xafladda ka dhacday Paris, isagoo ilmeeyay markii uu masraxa taagnaa – inkastoo ay kooxdiisu ciyaareysay fiidnimadii Isniinta.
End of Ugu akhris badan
Weeraryahanka ayaa haatan dhaawac ku maqan, taasoo la micno ah inuu seegay guuldaradii 1-0 ee PSG ka soo gaartay Marseille kulan wax ka beddel lagu sameeyay duufaan dhacaysay darteed.
"Waxa aan hadda la kulmay waa wax aan caadi ahayn, wax eray ah uma hayo, waxa ku dhacay PSG" ayuu yiri Dembele oo isagoo qiiroonaya ay hooyadiis kula soo biirtay masraxa.
"Waan yara walaacsanahay, ma fududa inaan ku guuleysto koobkaan, iyo in uu I gudoonsiiyo Ronaldinho oo ah halyeey kubada cagta ah, waa wax aan caadi aheyn.
"Waxaan rabaa inaan u mahadceliyo PSG oo ii timid 2023. Waa qoys cajiib ah, madaxweyne Nasser [Al-Khelaifi] wuxuu ii yahay aabe oo kale, waxaan sidoo kale rabaa inaan u mahadceliyo dhammaan shaqaalaha iyo tababaraha oo sidii aabbe oo kale ii ah - iyo dhammaan asxaabteyda kooxda.
"Waxaan si dhab ah ugu guulaysanay wax walba si wadajir ah, waxaad igu taageerteen wakhtiyadii fiicnaa iyo wakhtiyadii adkaa, koobkan shaqsiga ahi waa mid kooxda oo dhan u ah guul u soo hoyatay".
Xigashada Sawirka, Getty Images
Dembele wuxuu ka mid noqday tiro cayaartoy Faransiis ah oo abaalmarintan hore ugu guulaysaty waxayna kala yihiin:
Raymond Kopa – 1958
Michel Platini – 1983, 1984, 1985
Jean-Pierre Papin – 1991
Zinedine Zidane – 1998
Karim Benzema – 2022
Ousmane Dembele – 2025
30ka cayaartoy ee ugu horreeyey tartanka abaalmarinta Ballon d'Or ayaa sidan u kala galay kaalimaha:
30. Michael Olise
29. Florian Wirtz
28. Virgil van Dijk
27. Declan Rice
26. Erling Haaland
25. Denzel Dumfries
24. Fabian Ruiz
23. Jude Bellingham
22. Alexis Mac Allister
21. Serhou Guirassy
20. Lautaro Martinez
19. Joao Neves, Paris Saint-Germain
18. Scott McTominay, Napoli
17. Robert Lewndowski, Barcelona
16. Vinicius Jr, Real Madrid
15. Viktor Gyokeres, Arsenal
14. Desire Doue, Paris Saint-Germain
13. Harry Kane, Bayern Munich
12. Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, Paris Saint-Germain
11. Pedri, Barcelona
10. Nuno Mendes, Paris Saint-Germain
9. Gianluigi Donnarumma,  Paris Saint-Germain
8. Cole Palmer, Chelsea
7. Kylian Mbappe, Real Madrid
6. Achraf Hakimi, Paris Saint-Germain
5. Raphinha, Barcelona
4. Mohamed Salah, Liverpool
3. Vitinha, Paris Saint-Germain
2. Lamine Yamal, Barcelona
1. Ousmane Dembele, Paris Saint-Germain
Maamulaha PSG Luis Enrique – oo loo magacaabay tababaraha sanadka – ayaa u qalma in lagu amaano abaal marinta Dembele sababtoo ah taatiko uu bedelay bartamihii bishii Disembar.
Waxa uu Dembele ka soo beddelay baalka midig isagoo keenay booska weerarka dhexe kulankii Lyon 15kii Diseembar, isagoo booskaas  ka dhaliyay kaliya shan gool. 30 gool ayuu u dhaliyay PSG taariikhdaas wixii ka dambeeyay.
Dembele ayaa ugu dambeyntii muujiyay tayo wanaagsan oo ku qancisay Barcelona inay bixiso 96.8 milyan ginni, taasoo laga yaabo inay kor ugu kacdo £135.5m, si ay ugala soo wareegto Borussia Dortmund 2017.
Si kastaba ha ahaatee, PSG - oo loo magacaabay kooxda sannadka ee abaalmarinta Ballon d'Or 2025 - ayaa ahayd kooxdii cayaartoygaas heshiiska la gashay, iyagoo kula soo wareegay 43.5 milyan oo gini 2023.
Xigashada Sawirka, Getty Images
Dembele ayaa sidoo kale dhaliyay labo gool todobo kulan oo uu u saftay xulka Faransiiska xilli ciyaareedkii 2024-25.
Waa ciyaaryahankii lixaad ee Faransiis ah ee ku guuleysta abaalmarinta iyo kii labaad ee qarniga 21aad ka dib guushii Karim Benzema ee 2022.
Lamine Yamal oo 18, ayaa ku dhameystay kaalinta labaad - wuxuuna sidoo kale ku guuleysatay abaalmarinta Kopa Trophy ee ciyaaryahankii ugu fiicnaa.
Shan ka mid ah 10-ka ciyaaryahan ee ugu sarreeya ayaa qeyb ka ahaa kooxda PSG xilli ciyaareedkii hore oo ay ku jiraan Vitinha (Saddexaad), Achraf Hakimi (Lixaad), Gianluigi Donnarumma (9) iyo Nuno Mendes (10aad).
Xiddiga Liverpool Mohamed Salah ayaa galay kaalinta 4-aad halka uu 8-aad galay xiddiga Chelsea iyo England ee Cole Palmer.
Ku guuleystihii sannadkii hore, khadka dhexe ee Manchester City iyo Spain, Rodri, ayaan markan soo gelin liiska musharraxiinta ka dib markii uu dhaawacmay.
